entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
